text: Hanki fri'negeno Elisa'ma azeri oti'nea rise'mofo nererana, Elisa'a mago zupa vuno nanekea amanage huno ome asami'ne, Otinka nagaka'a zamavarenka ina moparega atupa knafi umaniku'ma hanana moparega umanio. Na'ankure Ra Anumzamo'a huno, amama mani'nona mopafina 7ni'a kafufi ne'zana omanenesigeno zamaga tontozanku hugahaze huno hu'ne.
